scripts.preserve: cd photo-store-app && npm run build && cd .. && cd server && npm install && cd .. && node ./scripts/filesHelper.js -c ./server/ ./build/server/  && node ./scripts/filesHelper.js -c ./photo-store-app/build/ ./build/photo-store-app/
scripts.predeploy: cd photo-store-app && npm run build && cd .. && node ./scripts/filesHelper.js -c ./server/ ./build/server/ && node ./scripts/filesHelper.js -c ./photo-store-app/build/ ./build/photo-store-app/
